about.title: About

My journey started with systems analysis and has evolved into full-stack development, where I've successfully delivered 15+ production applications for clients across various industries.

I'm experienced with multiple databases including PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, and MongoDB, choosing the right tool for each project's needs.
about.description3: On the frontend, I build responsive and performant applications using React with modern hooks, state management, and component architecture, as well as Next.js for server-side rendering and optimized performance. I focus on creating maintainable code, optimizing performance, and ensuring excellent user experiences. I'm also comfortable with Angular for enterprise applications, JavaScript/TypeScript, and have worked with various UI libraries and styling approaches including Tailwind CSS.
about.description4: Beyond coding, I bring strong problem-solving skills, experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies, and the ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines. I've led small teams as a TechLead, conducted code reviews, and mentored junior developers. My English level is B2 (Efset 52), enabling effective communication in international teams.
about.description5: I'm actively seeking middle fullstack opportunities where I can take ownership of features from design to deployment, work with modern tech stacks (C#/.NET, React, Node.js, Next.js, and more), and contribute to meaningful products. I'm particularly interested in roles that leverage my diverse technical expertise while allowing me to grow into more senior responsibilities.

pandaloyalty.title: PandaLoyalty - Customer Management Website
pandaloyalty.summary: Customer loyalty platform to manage members, points, rewards, and omnichannel integrations.
pandaloyalty.problem: Manual reward workflows and fragmented POS/CRM data across partners.
pandaloyalty.challenge: During integration with KiotViet POS system, I faced API rate limiting issues that caused transaction failures during peak hours. The system needed to handle 500+ concurrent requests while maintaining data consistency across multiple partner systems.
pandaloyalty.solution: I implemented a retry mechanism with exponential backoff and created a queue system using .NET Core Background Services. I also added caching for frequently accessed partner data and implemented circuit breaker pattern to prevent cascading failures. Collaborated with the team lead to design the architecture and received code review feedback.
pandaloyalty.outcome: Automated reward redemption and streamlined integrations, reducing manual operations for client teams. System now handles 1000+ requests/minute with 99.5% success rate.
pandaloyalty.linksNote: Demo and repo are available upon request.

plant.title: Plant Management Website
plant.summary: Plant management system for tracking tree growth, location, and customer contributions.
plant.problem: Needed a unified dashboard to monitor plant status and keep customers engaged post-purchase.
plant.challenge: The client required real-time location tracking for thousands of trees with GPS coordinates. Initial implementation caused performance issues when querying large datasets, leading to 5+ second load times for the dashboard.
plant.solution: I optimized database queries by adding proper indexes on location fields and implemented pagination. Created a geospatial search using PostgreSQL PostGIS extension for efficient location-based queries. Used Entity Framework's spatial data types and worked with the senior developer to review the query optimization approach.
plant.outcome: Delivered tracking workflows and admin tools for continuous updates. Dashboard load time reduced from 5+ seconds to under 1 second, supporting 10,000+ tree records.
plant.linksNote: Demo and repo are available upon request.

sale.title: Sale Miniapp
sale.summary: Miniapp for browsing products, checkout, and VNPay payments inside Zalo.
sale.problem: Needed a lightweight in-app checkout and order history for users.
sale.challenge: VNPay payment integration required handling redirects within Zalo's webview environment. The payment callback was failing because Zalo's webview blocked certain redirect patterns, causing users to lose their order state.
sale.solution: I implemented a state management solution using React Context and localStorage to persist order data across redirects. Created a payment status polling mechanism to check transaction completion when direct callbacks failed. Worked with the backend team to design a webhook-based fallback system and tested various redirect scenarios in Zalo's environment.
sale.outcome: Implemented payment flow and order history to speed up purchases. Payment success rate improved from 75% to 95%, with seamless user experience across Zalo's webview constraints.
sale.linksNote: Demo and repo are available upon request.
